CFPMulti-day Course

Module 4: Investment Planning

29 January 2026 - 12 February 2026
1 North bridge road, High street centre , #03-07/08, S179094

Course Schedule & Details

Having the knowledge to evaluate and choose the right investments is basic to the implementation of a sound financial plan. This module reviews all categories of investments, client assessment techniques, economic factors, risks and return analysis, valuation methods, asset allocation techniques, portfolio management, investment strategies and performance evaluation methods.

The Module 4 class schedule is as follows:

 

 

Module 4A
Investment Planning
Session Date Time
1 Thu, 29 Jan 2026 9:30am – 1:00pm (3.5)
2 Thu, 29 Jan 2026 2:00pm – 5:30pm (3.5)
3 Thu, 5 Feb 2026 9:30am – 1:00pm (3.5)
4 Thu, 5 Feb 2026 2:00pm – 5:30pm (3.5)
5 Thu, 12 Feb 2026 9:30am – 1:00pm (3.5)
6 Thu, 12 Feb 2026 2:00pm – 5:30pm (3.5)
Exam: Mon, 02 Mar 2026
2:00PM-5:00PM (3.0 HRS)		 Total Duration: 24 HRS
(Inclusive of Assessment)

 

Call us for more information regarding the enrolment process.
*All dates are correct at the time of uploading. FP reserves the right to make changes to the dates listed.

FP reserves the right to cancel any workshop if there is an insufficient number of students.
